name: Waygate
description:
The original build of Waygate was created in 12 weeks as a solo student project, with the main goal of learning to create a 2D character controller from the ground up, as well as learning to use various tools in Unreal Engine.

Being my first large project, there's definitely some issues, but I've done my best to fix things up to have something to put out there.

I hope you enjoy playing.

Credits

Help with art assets by Shackhal

Music by Chris Logsdon and Slaleky

Text Font by Somepx
